metadata.file_Purpose: PBR Material Substitution Index for Babylon.js Integration
metadata.file_Description: This JSON file serves as a material swapping index for Babylon.js. It maps keywords from imported .glb materials (e.g., from SketchUp) to predefined PBR material configurations. Each material entry includes all common PBR parameters to ensure consistency and ease of future updates.
metadata.file_NilExplanation: The string 'nil' is used to denote parameters that are intentionally unused or disabled in the current material configuration. This placeholder maintains the structure and allows for easy activation of these parameters in future revisions.

Material_CategoryIndex.MatCatID_ImportantNotes: The codes in this section are used to identify the material category which are ranges Between MAT##### & MAT##### as specified below.
Material_CategoryIndex.MatCatID_Usage: The codes in this section are placed at the end of the SketchUp material name to identify the material category, used for assignment of basic PBR parameters
